name: uuid-class
description: A minimal UUID class for JavaScript

scripts.clean: shx rm -rf mjs cjs module index*
scripts.copy: shx cp docs/README.md README.md && shx cp docs/LICENSE.md LICENSE.md
scripts.build: (npm run build:mjs & npm run build:cjs & wait) && npm run build:dist
scripts.build:cjs: tsc -d -p tsconfig.cjs.json && shx sed -i 's/\.js/.cjs/g' cjs/*.js > /dev/null && for f in cjs/*.js; do shx mv "$f" "${f%.js}.cjs"; done
scripts.changelog:head: echo "\n\n## v$npm_package_version" | bin/after.js 'CHANGELOG' docs/CHANGELOG.md
scripts.version: npm run changelog:head && npm run copy && npm run sed && git add .
scripts.prepack: npm run clean && npm run build

author: Florian Klampfer <mail@qwtel.com> (https://qwtel.com/)
